we're gonna put it in a nice big spoon
of kosher salt
we'll also toss in a little bit of

that means almost all of it and we want

I'm talking every nook every cranny and

then once we spread about three-quarters
of that mixture on that side let's go
ahead and gather that together and flip
it over into a bowl and then we'll take
the last quarter of that wet rub also
known as the rest of it and spread it
all over that fat side and then once
that's been completed we're gonna go
ahead and wrap this in plastic and
refrigerate this overnight and we'll
work with a shorter marination time

so we're gonna refrigerate that

you're gonna loop that string through

and then just in case you're new here

slide that string underneath cross it

this first time it's going to cinch up

it's just going to give it a little more
